title: Best of the Program | Guests: Nick Di Paolo & Jeffy Fisher | 10/2/19
description:
For anyone interested in TRUTH more than political tribalism, don’t miss the BlazeTV special “Ukraine Is the Democrats’ Russia,” streaming TOMORROW on Facebook and YouTube. The media claims Trump wants to replace the border wall with alligator moats and shooting immigrants in the legs. Comedian Nick Di Paolo joins the show with even more politically incorrect suggestions. And according to Nick, it’s better to die from obesity than from starvation. Bernie Sanders received emergency heart surgery last night. Heart blockage expert Jeffy Fisher says it may be a long recovery.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
